plot: A bitter sweet remembrance of the beginning and ending of a relationship, of what could have been a lasting romance but was not to be.
title: God for a Day
plot_es: A bitter sweet remembrance of the beginning and ending of a relationship, of what could have been a lasting romance but was not to be.
plot_en: A bitter sweet remembrance of the beginning and ending of a relationship, of what could have been a lasting romance but was not to be.
